en.answer:
No, it will not. That effect of Slifer the Sky Dragon will only activate if another monster is Special Summoned in Attack Position while Slifer the Sky Dragon is already face-up in the Monster Zone.

~~~

Similarly, the following monsters' effects also can only be activated if another monster is Special Summoned while they are already face-up in the Monster Zone, and cannot be activated if they are Special Summoned simultaneously:
● Red-Eyes Soul's ②nd effect
● Amazement Administrator Arlekino's ②nd effect
● The Iris Swordsoul's ②nd effect
● Lord Gaia the Fierce Knight's ②nd effect
● Catoblepas and the Witch of Fate's effect
● Gizmek Uka, the Festive Fox of Fecundity's ③rd effect
● Meklord Astro Dragon Asterisk's ②nd effect
● Keaf, Murk of the Ghoti's ②nd effect
● Shinobi Necro's ①st effect
● Bystial Baldrake's ②nd effect
● World Legacy - "World Chalice"'s ①st effect
● Superheavy Samurai Kabuto's ①st effect
● D/D/D Flame King Genghis's ①st effect
● D/D/D Flame High King Genghis's ①st effect
● D/D/D Gust King Alexander's ①st effect
● D/D/D Gust High King Alexander's ②nd effect
● Dramaturge of Despia's ①st effect
● Topologic Bomber Dragon's ①st effect
● Amunessia, the Ogdoadic Queen's ②nd effect
● Rescue-ACE Fire Engine's ②nd effect
● U.A. Blockbacker's ②nd effect
● Naturia Antjaw's effect
● Naturia Camellia's ③rd effect
● Naturia Strawberry's effect
● Naturia Horneedle's effect
● Kumongous, the Sticky String Kaiju's ④th effect
● Absolute Crusader's effect
● Merry Melffys's ②nd effect
● Melffy Catty's ①st effect
● Melffy Puppy's ①st effect
● Melffy Fenny's ①st effect
● Melffy Pony's ①st effect
● Melffy Wally's ①st effect
● Ultimate Flagship Ursatron's ①st effect
● Mysterion the Dragon Crown's ②nd effect
● Lancea, Ancestral Dragon of the Ice Mountain's ①st effect
● Swordsoul Sinister Sovereign - Qixing Longyuan's ②nd effect
● Plunder Patrollship Jord's ①st effect
● Vampire Sucker's ②nd effect
● Crusadia Spatha's ③rd effect
● Salamangreat Pyro Phoenix's ③rd effect
● Trickstar Divaridis's ③rd effect
● Yuki-Onna, the Absolute Zero Mayakashi's ③rd effect
● Ryu Okami's effect
● Goyo Emperor's ②nd effect
en.question: Both Slifer the Sky Dragon and an opponent's monster are Special Summoned simultaneously in Attack Position by the effect of, e.g., Albion the Sanctifire Dragon. Will the effect of Slifer the Sky Dragon now activate to reduce the opponent's monster's ATK?
en.title: If both Slifer the Sky Dragon and an opponent's monster are Special Summoned at the same time, will Slifer the Sky Dragon's effect be activated?

ja.question: 「<<18498>>」の『②：相手ターンに、自分・相手の墓地のモンスターを合計２体対象として発動できる。そのモンスターをお互いのフィールドに１体ずつ特殊召喚する』効果によって自分フィールドに「<<4999>>」と相手モンスターが同時に特殊召喚された場合、特殊召喚した「<<4999>>」の『④：相手フィールドにモンスターが攻撃表示で召喚・特殊召喚される度に発動する。そのモンスターの攻撃力は２０００ダウンする。０になった場合そのモンスターを破壊する』効果は発動しますか？
ja.title: 「<<4999>>」と相手モンスターが同時に特殊召喚された場合、「<<4999>>」の効果は発動しますか？
